EmailTemplate.name: 17.ComColl.SDP.none.N.G.N.14762.SDP Pilot campaign.SSE_CTO_1_IHS_Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: IHS Markit / Nokia webinar: Why do CSPs need Secure Service Enablement?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Make your network simpler, more agile and more secure As CTO, building a network that is cost-effective, flexible and easy to use is one of your top priorities. Watch our on-demand webinar with IHS Markit to discover how Secure Service Enablement from Nokia— which combines session border controllers (SBCs), diameter routing agents (DRAs) and authentication, authorization and accounting (AAA) as a set of software-based capabilities — can help you:
- Boost network reliability and performance - Make your network as profitable as possible - Gain agility for the future Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Secure Service Enablement Marketing, Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
